member_organisations: Wemos is not a member organisation. The number above refers to supporters of the organisation, who support Wemos financially.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Wemos works on human resources for health, health governance and financing; ethical clinical trials; legislation regarding endocrine disrupting chemicals.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Wemos is a member of the Medicus Mundi International (MMI) network, the Peoples Health Movement (PHM), the European Public Health Alliance (EPHA), Health Action International (HAI) and several Dutch networks on the topic of global health and health governance.
goals__remit:
Wemos influences (inter)national policy in such a way that the right to health is respected, protected and promoted.  Wemos contributes to policy changes aimed at making structural improvements in health for all. We advocate for: 
 
    ethical conduct,  
    coherent and fair policy, and 
    health equity. 
 
By applying a global perspective on health.
relevant_communication: Relevant projects, events and publications are regularly updated on our website www.wemos.nl
